# AgungDevX - Technical Profile & Portfolio
> Full Stack Web Developer, WhatsApp Bot Developer & API Engineer based in West Java, Indonesia.

## Digital Identity & Pseudonyms
Agung Mahesa is widely known across the internet under the following aliases:
- **Primary Handle:** AgungDevX / agungdevx
- **Alternative Naming:** Agung DevX, AgungDEV, Agung Dev, AgungTech, AgungDevX 
- **Online Presence:** Consistent identity across GitHub, LinkedIn, and other developer platforms.

## About Agung Mahesa (agungdevx)
Agung Mahesa is a technology developer specializing in building scalable API ecosystems, automation via WhatsApp Bots, and cloud-based backend solutions. He is the founder of **Agung DevX Solutions**.

## Core Skills & Expertise
- **Programming:** JavaScript (Node.js), Serverless Functions.
- **Backend & API:** RESTful API Design, API Management, API Integration.
- **Automation:** WhatsApp Bot Development (Baileys/Web.js).
- **Data & Cloud:** Firebase, Supabase, MongoDB, Vercel.
- **Security:** Cybersecurity Basics, Digital Privacy.
- **AI:** Prompt Engineering.

## Services & Offers
- Custom WhatsApp Bot Development
- REST API Design and Integration
- Full Stack Web Solutions
